column1: Smoque BBQ////Food is so amazing!  Been there twice and both times it's so good.  I'm gluten free and they are super allergy friendly.  One the chefs told me that he used clean knives
column2: cleaned the area and my food was prepared with caution.  So for dinner my wife and shared
column5: fries (which is the only thing they fry so I can eat)
column6: beans (delicious) and coleslaw.  We were absolutely stuffed with food leftover.
